news.title: The Beach Boys’ Brian Wilson Dies at 82
news.summary: The beloved musician had been living with a neurocognitive disorder akin to dementia

news.title: Sabrina Carpenter Announces New Album Man’s Best Friend
news.summary: The recent Jack Antonoff and Amy Allen collaboration “Manchild” leads the pop singer’s follow-up to Short n’ Sweet

news.title: Hayden Pedigo Announces North American Tour
news.summary: A new batch of autumn dates behind I’ll Be Waving as You Drive Away
